author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO REMAINS A MAJOR HURRICANE IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC...
summary: ...KIKO REMAINS A MAJOR HURRICANE IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 11:00 PM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 17.1, -143.4 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 960 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO REMAINS A MAJOR HURRICANE IN THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 11:00 PM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 17.1, -143.4 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 960 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
